Description:
IDEAL FIRST HOME OR INVESTMENT
This affordable home located within a short distance to both, Monash University & Monash Medical Centre is a great opportunity to move straight in and renovate, or the perfect opportunity to acquire a rental investment at an affordable price.
Situated opposite to the Keeley Reserve and within walking distance to Westall train station and Westall Secondary College, the location ticks all the boxes.
Comprises a bright and comfortable lounge, separate kitchen/meals area, 3 good size bedrooms, separate laundry, and generous front and rear yard areas.
Currently tenanted with a great rental return, ideal first home or an outstanding renovation opportunity
Insights: 1/4 Oakes Avenue, CLAYTON SOUTH VIC 3169 was last sold in 2013 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in CLAYTON SOUTH have recently been sold.

Description:
ATTENTION FIRST HOME BUYER! BRAND NEW 2 BEDROOM RESIDENCES IN PRIME LOCATION!
1/33 Manoon Road Clayton South UNDER OFFER $475,000
3/33 Manoon Road Clayton South UNDER OFFER $562,000
These fantastic two bedroom brand new residences will appeal to both the first home buyer and the astute investor. Presenting a rare and fantastic opportunity within walking distance to Clayton Train Station, Clayton Community Centre (with swimming pool and library), Clayton Central Shopping District and Monash Medical Centre, 2 minute walk to bus stop which will take you to Monash University.
Featuring: 2 large bedrooms with built-in-robes, ducted heating, parquetry flooring, spacious open-plan living and dining room, huge kitchen with stone bench tops, modern central bathroom, gas stainless steel appliances, large landscaped private courtyard, single remote garage and much, much more!
Just completed, these brand new units direct from the developer are priced to sell!

Description:
At the Centre of Everything
This stylishly renovated large ground floor apartment offers kitchen with stainless steel appliances, two large bedrooms, secure underground parking with extra large lock-up storage area, split system heating/cooling and intercom security entrance. Additionally, the property offers a large private rear courtyard, uncommon in most apartments.
Situated across from Clayton Train Station, Clayton Shopping Centre, Monash Medical Centre and Monash University, this unique development is the ideal location for both the investor or the first home buyer looking to break into this most sort after apartment-style living.
The property is located directly opposite the Clayton Community Centre which includes a library, pre-school, occasional care, youth and family services, maternal and child care services, cafe, gymnasium, an indoor aquatic facility and community health services.

Description:
Stunning Modern Elegance! Luxury living! Lucky 8!
This very new and spacious builder's own home, it is the cornerstone of modern luxury! Ideally situated close to Clayton Shopping Center, Clayton Community Center, Bus stops, Clayton Train Station, library, local parks, you will not find a better growth location for this exclusive masterpiece.
A high-ceiling reception area greets your first steps onto the spotted gum flooring which leads into the spacious formal living area and open plan kitchen with island stone benchtops, extra-large fridge space. The flowing floor plan takes you to the master bedroom with 2.4meter solid door, walk in robes and fully-equipped ensuite with floor to ceiling tiles, frameless shower screens and stone bench tops.
As you glide upstairs you will note that ease of living has been catered for two large bedrooms with built-in-robes, superb central bathroom with shower and bathtub, separate toilet, both fully tiled from floor to ceiling.
The stunning family room adjoins the open-plan fully equipped chef's kitchen, beautiful stone bench tops, 700mm stainless steel Blanco stove, oven and rangehood and dishwasher. Open the sliding doors, step outside and your vision will be engulfed by a complete full surround spotted gum decking enclosure, perfect for a BBQ while entertaining family and friends.
The property has many features including bluestone entrance, ducted heating and cooling throughout, ducted vacuum system, 5.1 surround theatre system with hidden cabling, dual roller blinds, top of the range tapwares, water tanks, landscaped gardens, and too many features to list!
Be quick to inspect this builder's own home master piece. Truly one of the best residences in the area on a lucky 8 number! This fantastic double storey residence is the very epitome of exquisite taste and exemplary style.

Prospect purchasers should make their own enquiries to verify the information contained in this document.

Description:
Under offer $550,188
Excellent opportunity available for the first-home buyer or astute investor to secure this deluxe double storey residence situated within walking distance to Clayton Train Station, local schools & parklands, bus stop at your door, Clayton shopping district, Clayton Community Centre and only minutes away from Monash Medical Centre & Monash University.
This architecturally designed townhouse with extreme craftsmanship throughout featuring ensuite to master bedroom, 2 large bedrooms with built-in-robes, European Oak flooring, high-end appliances and finishings, modern bathrooms with full height mirrors, high ceilings, alarm system, emporite kitchen with solid benchtops and undermount sinks and much, much more!
With your very own street frontage, remote controlled garage and extra car space, fabulous huge alfresco area with low maintenance courtyard perfect for entertaining family and friends!
Look no further! This is what you have been dreaming of! Move right in to enjoy this fabulous lifestyle!

Description:
Modern Double Storey Apartment In The Heart Of Clayton! Be First To Inspect!
This is a unique opportunity for the investor, first home buyer or downsizer looking to buy the ideal apartment in a prominent location of Clayton.
This modern double storey two bedroom apartment offering central tiled bathroom with toilet, modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances, living area adjoining with balcony, secure underground parking, air-conditioning and intercom security entrance.
Right opposite we have the Clayton Community Centre including a library, theatrette, pre-school, occasional care, youth and family services, maternal and child care services, caf, gymnasium, meeting rooms, an indoor aquatic facility and MonashLink community health services.
The apartment is also walking distance to Clayton shopping precinct and Clayton train station, also short distance to Monash University, Chadstone Shopping Centre and access to Dandenong Road and Monash Freeway.

Description:
696m2 OF LAND TO FURTHER DEVELOP WALK TO CLAYTON CENTRAL!
Situated in one of Clayton's finest streets is this wonderful 3 bedroom home appealing to both the homebuyer, investor and the developer within walking distance to Clayton Train Station, Clayton Community Centre, local schools, parklands and Clayton Central Shopping District will sure get the blood boiling in anyone looking to renovate/multi-develop on this massive block of land.
Comprising: 3 large bedrooms, central bathroom with separate toilet, kitchen with gas appliances and meals area, Great for entertaining and overlooking a generous allotment of 696 sqm approx. with fantastic dual occupancy potential to develop at the rear or multi-unit development site (S.T.C.A.).
Land Dimension: 15.67m x 44.48m = 696sqm approx.
Deposit: 10%
Settlement: 30/60 days

Description:
Fantastic Place for Families
A peaceful court, with Heatherton Park and bus stop around the corner and easy access to Westall Shopping centre, train station and Freeway, makes this the ideal place for a family to settle. This immaculate 3-bedroom home is the one you've been waiting for, where the s/s kitchen/meals area and fully tiled bathroom with spa bath have been updated and the formal lounge and sizable versatile sunroom/study provide ample space for adults and kids to enjoy. Outdoors, the backyard is extensively paved with plenty of space to play and host barbeques, while extras include, ducted heating, security shutters, alarm, water tanks and double gate entry to carport and single lock up garage.

Description:
SOLD!
Calling all first-time nesters and investors! This modern, light and bright townhouse enjoys a sophisticated two-tone kitchen boasting waterfall Caesar stone bench tops, overlooking an extensive open plan living and dining area. Upstairs accommodates 3 bedrooms, all with mirrored, fitted robes, master with ensuite, and a central bathroom, both with oversized showers. Enjoy relaxing and entertaining in the low-maintenance, paved courtyard, ideal for alfresco dining. Situated in an ultra-convenient location with Westall Station at the end of the street, and just a short stroll to the local shopping strip, with ducted heating, alarm, security doors and much more, this one won't last long!

Description:
Modern and Elegant Townhouse!
Just 6 years young, this modern and delightful townhouse will captivate you with its seamless lines, flowing floor plan and sense of serenity. An extensive open plan formal living/dining and family zone is overlooked by a sophisticated kitchen replete with Caesar stone waterfall bench tops, quality appliances and breakfast bar. Upstairs features 3 robed bedrooms, ensuite and an elegant family bathroom. Step outside and enjoy the peace and tranquillity of the inviting, exquisite gardens and paved courtyard. Inclusions: alarm, powder room, ducted heating and refrigerated cooling, water tank and remote double garage. Enjoy all that popular Clayton Sth has to offer and just 150 metres from Westall Station, inspect today.

Description:
Easy Living or Rental Option
All the carefree security you're looking for in a unit with a bit of extra space and a fantastic location ... Set at the rear to protect your privacy, this single level unit offers a generous living and dining room as well as a plenty of room for meals in the kitchen updated five years ago, two good-sized bedrooms with built in robes near the bathroom, reverse cycle air-conditioner, separate laundry and a large double garage. For those who love to indulge in the outdoors the courtyard garden has all the space you need to relax or fire up the BBQ for family and friends. Take a look around you at the park down the street and buses on the corner providing a quick trip to Clayton's vibrant shopping & cafe strip, train station and Monash Medical Centre.

Description:
Best Location Ever! Exceptional Modern Elegance!
Excellent opportunity available for the first-home buyer or astute investor to secure this deluxe double storey residence situated within walking distance to Westall Secondary College, Westall Train Station, Bus stop, parklands, local shops, post office and only minutes away from Monash Medical Centre, Clayton Shopping District, Clayton Community Centre and IKEA Shopping Centre.
This architecturally designed townhouse with excellent craftsmanship throughout features ensuite to master bedroom, 2 large bedrooms with build-in-robes, spacious open living area, high-end appliances and finishing's, modern bathrooms, open plan kitchen with island stone benchtops, extra-large fridge space, gas ducted heating, refrigerated cooling, home security system, water tank and much, much more!
Easy access to your double lock up garage from your fabulous private outdoor area with low maintenance courtyard, it is a perfect and practical design for your daily life, plus entertaining family and friends!
Look no further! This is what you have been dreaming of! Move right in to enjoy this fabulous lifestyle!

Description:
Top Spot with Development Opportunities
Character-filled immaculate presentation defines this clinker BV home, nestled on 755 sq metres approx that has 'dual occupancy' written all over it (STCA). Capitalize on the rich potential setting by building a sound investment property at the back or extending the current home, or start from scratch with brand new townhouses (STCA). Under high ceilings, with ornate cornices, the home's inviting floorplan offers formal lounge (gas heater & air-conditioner), dining room, neat kitchen/meals area, large covered outdoor area with bistro awnings perfect for your morning coffee or barbeques & alarm. No matter what your intentions are for this fabulous property, you're bound to be rewarded in this prime location, close to Clayton Central shopping centre, eateries, train station, schools and Monash Medical Centre.

Description:
UNDER OFFER $621,000
Attention home buyer, investor, and developer!! Live there, or rent it out, or put in students. Strategically positioned from a developer perspective, this ideally located allotment has the potential to construct multi-unit townhouses (S.T.C.A) with the Clayton bus going past the front door and within easy walking distance of Westall Train Station, close proximity to the Princes Highway and the IKEA Shopping Center, Springvale Central, Clayton Central, Monash Hospital, Monash University, local shops, schools, and short drive to Chadstone Shopping Centre; what more can you want?
Features included: Three spacious bedrooms, two bathrooms, central kitchen with gas stove and gas hot water, 3 large living areas include separate lounge room, dining room and family room, separate laundry area, double door garage, storage, and a one bedroom bungalow with on-suite and kitchen at the back, all set on a massive block of land of 845sqm approx.
With an enormous frontage of 19.9m approx, this property would be your best investment for years to come!
Inspect now before it is too late!

Description:
Lifestyle And Location Into One
Perfect for that first step out of home or to add to your investment portfolio is this low maintenance, neat and tidy town residence accommodating for every one needs within walking distance to Central Clayton, Clayton Train Station, shops and schools, only minutes away to Monash Medical Centre, you couldn't ask for a better potential growth location.
Lovingly cared for, this beautiful unit features 2 large bedrooms with BIR's, spacious lounge area, central tiled bathroom with separate toilet, fully appointed kitchen with gas s/steel appliances, heating and cooling system, double glazed windows, single car port and much much more.
Don't miss your chance and inspect today!
Terms: 10% deposit
Settlement: 30/60 days

Description:
Bright and Cheery Abode in a Peaceful Position
Superbly presented and boasting heartwarming charm, this fantastic 2 bedroom unit is the perfect combination of relaxed comfort and low-maintenance living.
Ideally suited for first home buyers or savvy investors, this minimal fuss brick beauty is impressive with a peaceful and spacious front lounge room, timber themed kitchen with room for meals, two well-sized bedrooms with built-in robes, neat bathroom with a separate toilet, and a laundry with ample storage and external access.
An outstanding prospect for those with renovation aspirations or ideal to be lived in as is, this elevated retreat also features a paved courtyard and garden at the rear, heating and cooling, security door, and double lock-up garage.
In a quiet street and conveniently close to Namatjira Park, Clayton Shopping Centre, schools, bus and train.
Photo ID required at all open for inspections.

Description:
Refurbished Home on a Large Block
Updated only a couple of years ago, the future occupants of this immaculately presented family home can rest easy with peace of mind that not a single job needs tending to the moment that they call this place home. Cooks of any level will appreciate the spacious Caesar stone kitchen with stainless steel upright stove & adjoining family/meals area, while the huge backyard filled with fruit trees, plus under cover BBQ area & 2 powered bungalows is qualified to entertain both adults and kids. Other engaging features include a sizable formal lounge, 3 bedrooms, including master bedroom with WIR & ensuite, central bathroom, evaporative cooling and 2 separate driveways providing off street parking for up to 6 cars. Kinder, Primary school and buses are just up the road and Clayton Central shops, eateries, train station & Monash Medical Centre just a short drive away.
Anna Mastrogiannis : 0416 235 329
Insights: 66 Kallay Street, CLAYTON SOUTH VIC 3169 was last sold in 2013 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in CLAYTON SOUTH have recently been sold.
